chat_history.message:
Hello, I have an iPhone 13 with the following issue:
Too damaged edges with colorless dots.
Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile,

I take the liberty of contacting you following the return of the iPhone 13. Indeed, the customer returned it for a refund.

In addition, the tracking link tells us that the package was delivered to you on 06/07/2024.

In this case, I invite you to process the customer’s request within the deadline.

Thank you for helping us satisfy our customers,
Tiana-Rijamalala from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare, 

Thank you. We are still processing the device. Will update you soon once we finish checking the device. Thank you.

Regards, 
KW

Dear ecomobile,

Since we have no feedback from you, we will refund the customer.

Thank you for your understanding and wish you a great day.

Regards,
Tiana-Rijamalala from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund.

Regards,
KW
